title: Viking Helmet
summaries: The Viking Helmet is an armor piece for the helmet slot. It has a 2*1/50 (2%) chance to be dropped by Undead Vikings in the Ice biome. It provides a sizeable amount of defense (as much as a Gold Helmet or Tungsten Helmet), but it does not have an associated set or set bonus, hindering its utility.

statistics.Sell: 50 SC
